Q: How do I reserve a parking spot?
A: Use the 'Reserve Spot' button on the home screen and select your desired location and time.

Q: Can I cancel a reservation?
A: Yes, go to 'My Reservations' and select the one you want to cancel.

Q: Is my payment information secure?
A: Yes, we use encrypted channels for all transactions.

Q: What if I arrive late?
A: Your spot is held for 15 minutes after the start time.

Q: Who do I contact for support?
A: Email us at support@reserveparking.com
